name: UserGems
headline: AI-powered sales solution based on your best customers
description:
UserGems is an AI-driven prospecting solution for revenue teams to drive bigger pipelines, faster sales cycles, and larger deals.

Whenever your customers change their jobs, UserGems automatically surfaces them as new leads to your sales reps directly in Salesforce. This enables reps to close more deals, faster.

Leveraging machine learning, UserGems automatically identifies other prospects that match your best customers. That means you get a complete, up-to-date list of leads that match your ICP, persona and other key criteria so that reps spend less time sourcing leads, and more time selling.

# AI for outbound **that actually converts**
Identify, prioritize, and engage with buyers using AI agents -- powered by buying signals and your CRM data.
Email*
LeanData BookIt Log ID
![UserGems AI Platform](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644c4b3029d4e7eb727426fb/67b230c9db9ff326a08bf64e_Group%2030269.webp)
YOU'RE IN GREAT COMPANY
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644c4b3029d4e7eb727426fb/646eb8501130ffb2c90347b6_Gong%20logo-min.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644c4b3029d4e7eb727426fb/646eb8501667735aae6c7cf1_Usertesting%20logo-min.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644c4b3029d4e7eb727426fb/644c4b3029d4e72070742a7f_Mimecast-white-logo.webp)
![Box](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644c4b3029d4e7eb727426fb/66453c7ac5322c165a5537eb_Box%20logo-min.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644c4b3029d4e7eb727426fb/646eb8509a947b6271f41733_Salesloft%20logo-min.svg)
![LeanIX logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644c4b3029d4e7eb727426fb/65d5eec0069f1ee3fc57c683_LeanIX.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644c4b3029d4e7eb727426fb/646eb850ad033906fa75870c_Greenhouse%20logo-min.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644c4b3029d4e7eb727426fb/66453de411eb09f4f5c7c113_Crowdstrike%20logo-min.svg)
BUYING SIGNALS
## Know who to reach out to, when, and why
Focus on the most promising buyers instead of sifting through lists and manual research.
Create, enrich, and prioritize accounts & buyers based on relevant signals, such as:
  * Past Champions
  * New Hires & Promotions
  * Buying Group Members
  * Website Visits
  * Funding & Hiring
  * Previous Closed Lost
  * Intent Data, and more...


[See details →](https://www.usergems.com/</product/signals>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644c4b3029d4e7eb727426fb/677b1d537edda24e27d71c74_Group%206178.webp)
AI MESSAGING
## Emails that your buyers reply to
Combining your CRM data, past engagement, and signals, Gem-E drafts email sequences, call scripts, and LinkedIn messages for your reps.
Every message feels like it came from your best rep -- personalized, relevant, and designed to convert.
[See details →](https://www.usergems.com/</product/ai-sdr>)
![UserGems AI outbound email](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644c4b3029d4e7eb727426fb/677b253b592d46654b965e33_Group%2030250.webp)
USERGEMS AI vs. OTHER AI
## An AI Agent that isn't a "spam cannon"
Many AI SDRs have promised much but delivered little. Here is why Gem-E is different:
[See for yourself →](https://www.usergems.com/</contact>)
### Best-in-class data
Gem-E is powered by UserGems' proprietary data and training models, which has never lost in a head-to-head data accuracy comparison.
### Actually relevant emails
Gem-E drafts messages based on your CRM data and relevant signals, not generic GPT prompts and random data.
### Not a "shadow outbound" system
Gem-E integrates with your favorite tools (Salesforce, Hubspot, Outreach, Salesloft, etc.) so you have full control and visibility.
WORKFLOWS
## Always-on pipeline generation
Trigger automated workflows for your team and/or Gem-E to engage with buyers at the right time, consistently. 
You'll 10X your team's capacity and impact, while every rep will perform like your best rep.
[See details →](https://www.usergems.com/</product/workflows>)
![UserGems workflow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/644c4b3029d4e7eb727426fb/677c5869d1ede0d10bf2760d_Group%2030257.webp)
SUPPORT
## “Consider it done”
From day 0, you'll have dedicated and technical Customer Success and Revenue Ops experts training your teams, sharing playbooks, or even bouncing ideas off of.
[See customer stories →](https://www.usergems.com/</customers>)

generated_description:
UserGems is a pioneering sales technology company founded in 2015, initially hailing from the esteemed Y Combinator Batch S14. Their mission is straightforward yet powerful: to empower sales teams with an AI-driven prospecting solution that is grounded in the behaviors and traits of their best customers. The company is based in Austria and boasts a skilled team of 60 employees.

At UserGems, the game-changing feature is the way they leverage AI to enhance lead generation in an incredibly efficient manner. Whenever a customer transitions to a new job, UserGems automatically flags this change as a new lead within Salesforce, allowing sales reps to optimize their outreach and close deals more quickly. This kind of responsiveness is crucial in today’s fast-paced sales environment.

UserGems employs machine learning to identify and surface prospects that closely resemble their most successful customers. This enables companies to build a comprehensive list of leads that fit their Ideal Customer Profile (ICP) without the usual grunt work of lead sourcing. The system frees up sales reps to focus on what really matters: selling.

Their flagship product, Gem-E, acts as an AI outbound agent, helping sales teams personalize communication by drafting emails, call scripts, and even LinkedIn messages based on real-time signals and historical CRM data. This results in outreach that feels personal and relevant, significantly increasing the probability of conversions.

The company has rightly positioned itself within the B2B sales arena, offering benefits that include a measurable ROI—many of their clients have reported substantial increases in their pipelines and deal sizes since integrating UserGems into their workflows.

Michael Siebel, a prominent figure in the startup ecosystem, serves as their Group Partner, adding to the credibility of their innovative approach. UserGems is tagged under sales technology and has attracted recognition for its exceptional data quality and ease of integration with existing sales tools like Salesforce, HubSpot, and Outreach.

If you're part of a revenue team looking to double your pipeline without doubling your effort, UserGems offers a compelling solution that not only streamlines the lead generation process but also ensures your outreach is timely and effective. Check them out at [UserGems](https://www.usergems.com) for more insights into how they can revolutionize your sales strategy.
